briefdescription.para: function getter of the value of a sensor from the array of sensors.

parameterdescription.para: the index of the array of sensors

simplesect.para: the value of the sensor in 2 bytes signed.

briefdescription.para: function the read the channels of the MCP3008 by opening, reading and closing the sysfs files.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOpenAdc when a sysfs file of the MCP3008 fails to open or errReadAdc when a sysfs file read of the MCP3008 fails or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to close the sysfs files of the MCP3008 kernel module.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errCloseAdc when a sysfs file of the MCP3008 fails to close or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to read the value of a sensor from a sysfs file of the MCP3008 kernel module.

simplesect.para: ADC_READ_ERROR when the file reading fails or the value of a sensor.

briefdescription.para: function to open a sysfs file of the MCP3008 kernel module.

simplesect.para: ADC_READ_ERROR when the file opening fails or the file location.

detaileddescription.para:
Mael Parot, Corentin Berthon
1.1
11/04/2024
Contains all functions related to reading sensors values from the sysfs linux module file for an MCP3008
